## IToken.verify() method

Verifies and decodes a token, returning the original payload.

**Signature:**

```typescript
verify(token: string): Payload;
```

**Returns:**

The decoded payload

{<!-- -->Error<!-- -->} If the token is invalid, expired, or malformed
